archimate:Requirement.name: SM.1.1.6c: c) detailed standards, procedures, processes and guidelines are defined to support the main policy, including topic-specific policies (e.g. access control, acceptable use and physical security)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
